name: Acceptance Meditation Labyrinth
description:
Made for the UCSC 2020 Summer Jam #3

Description:

The jam theme was "Inseparable". That for me this year has meant learning to accept and love the parts of yourself that you might have difficulty changing.

Gameplay:

Traverse a meditation labyrinth in AR and work on accepting and learning to love the insecurities: Oversharing, Timid, and Overextending Yourself.
